common_query.common: SELECT SST.*, (SELECT CODE_DESC FROM SCDP_CODE SC WHERE SC.CODE_TYPE = 'CDM_YEAR' AND SC.SYS_CODE = SST.CUR_YEAR) AS CUR_YEAR_NAME, (SELECT CODE_DESC FROM SCDP_CODE SC WHERE SC.CODE_TYPE = 'SCM_SAE_CASE_TYPE' AND SC.SYS_CODE = SST.MATERIAL_TYPE) AS MATERIAL_TYPE_NAME, (SELECT CODE_DESC FROM SCDP_CODE SC WHERE SC.CODE_TYPE = 'SCM_SAE_CASE_STATE' AND SC.SYS_CODE = SST.STATE) AS STATE_NAME, (SELECT SU.USER_NAME FROM SCDP_USER SU WHERE SU.USER_ID = SST.CREATE_BY) AS CREATE_BY_NAME, SU1.USER_NAME AS USER_CODE_NAME, SO.ORG_NAME AS USER_DEPARTMENT FROM SCM_SAE_TASK SST LEFT JOIN SCDP_USER SU1 ON SST.USER_CODE = SU1.USER_ID LEFT JOIN SCDP_ORG SO ON SU1.ORG_UUID = SO.UUID where ${conditions} and ${selfconditions}
